Recentley, the clearance revenue is registered in the same month, when the cash amount is received.
(1) Earmarked Collections &Earmarked Payments are collections from taxs and revenues due to LGU, 90% of Property Tax & 50% of Transportation fees.
(2) Withheld (+) or transferred from past collections and/or transferred advances (-).
(3) Based on the generalization from the Ministry of Finance, it has been done a clearance reduction from the indebtedness of local authorities and the Electricity Compa
